Comment: Why would we need measurements when Dear Leader can simply tell us that drug use and crime are way up thanks to Sleepy Joe’s open borders, we have the best maternal mortality (lots of people are saying it), climate change isn’t real, and hurricanes can simply be redirected with his sharpie? Measurements are woke and unmanly. The only measurement we should take is how manly and bigly we do tariffs. /s
Author: VP_of_Lasers

Comment: Loss of this data is going to set back data collection for *decades*. Even if everything went perfect and we managed to oust Trump and the GOP in Congress tomorrow, the data is corrupted and will require years of work to revalidate. What a fucking waste.
